entries.original: **Iron Law:** NO COMPLETION CLAIMS WITHOUT FRESH VERIFICATION EVIDENCE
entries.translation: **철칙:** 새로운 검증 증거 없이는 완료 주장 금지

entries.original: Added to: architect, executor, executor-high, ralph, CLAUDE.md
entries.translation: 추가됨: architect, executor, executor-high, ralph, CLAUDE.md

entries.original: 4-phase: Root Cause → Pattern Analysis → Hypothesis Testing → Implementation
entries.translation: 4단계: 근본 원인 → 패턴 분석 → 가설 테스트 → 구현

entries.original: 3-failure circuit breaker to prevent infinite fix loops
entries.translation: 무한 수정 루프를 방지하기 위한 3-실패 회로 차단기

entries.original: Fast-path for obvious bugs (typos, missing imports)
entries.translation: 명백한 버그에 대한 빠른 경로 (오타, 누락된 import)

entries.original: Stage 1: Spec compliance (did you build what was asked?)
Stage 2: Code quality (only after Stage 1 passes)
New `/tdd` skill with strict test-first discipline
entries.translation: 엄격한 테스트 우선 규율을 가진 새로운 `/tdd` 스킬

entries.original: Iron Law: NO PRODUCTION CODE WITHOUT FAILING TEST FIRST
entries.translation: 철칙: 실패하는 테스트 없이 프로덕션 코드 금지

entries.original: One question at a time, build on responses
entries.translation: 한 번에 한 질문, 응답에 기반하여 구축
